Computing.Details: Artificial Gravity is a technology that is the direct result of having immense amounts of energy at hand. The applications of artificial gravity are both obvious and subtle.||The obvious application is that ships can now travel for extended periods through space with native gravity levels without compromising the ship design with fragile and unreliable physical motion devices (i.e. ships do not have to spin their hulls to maintain gravity).||The historical fleets of the Drengin Empire and the Arcean Empire in the pre-artificial gravity era are very obvious. Their hulls spin on a super conducting pivot powered by regulated micro bursts of thrust to keep the spinning consistent. Needless to say, these ships would not be reliable in battle.||The Drengin fleet that conquered the Torian home world in the pre-hyperdrive era were all without artificial gravity and relied on a stargate that still resulted in a travel time of nearly a year. Two of the troop carriers in that journey had a malfunction in their rotational axis control during the journey resulting in having over 25,000 Drengin shock troops having to live out their remaining lives in space. ||Fortunately, the lives of those Drengin shock troops was short since they were soon converted into fuel. Another key use is that it can be used to channel gravity on planets which allows for more serious planetary improvements.

Logistics.Details: It is a challenge for our ships to move away from the source. For reasons unknown, the spark of life within all cybernetic organisms weakens based on the absolute distance from the ultimate source of sentient life.||Beyond a certain point, cybernetic organisms revert to non-sentient machines. To that end, we have developed a cybernetic support system which magnifies the spark of life allowing our ships and troops to move further out into the galaxy.
We have improved the range of our ships by enhancing the Cybernetic Support on our ships.

Logistics.Description: Increases the range of our ships.
Logistics.Details: Our ships can now travel further from home base thanks to improvements in our life support systems. The further we travel from the source, the more the spark of life within us fades. The Cybernetic Life Support system improves upon this and enables our ships to travel further.
Our ships can now travel further than ever from the ultimate source of life. The galaxy is now open to our conquest.

Computing.Details: Collective Research is our equivalent to what the biologicals call "Research Centers". The difference here is that we can attain this level of research more easily because we are inherently better at pooling our "intellectual resources".||Or put another way, meat is less effective at thinking than we are.

Meat species would refer to this technology as a Research Academy. However, because meat can't reason as effectively as we can (though we remain impressed that meat can think at all) our equivalent is less expensive to research.

The fleshling version of this technology is known as an Invention Matrix. Invention Cities are massive complexes in which hundreds of thousands of our kind assimulate together to work out the secrets of the universe.

Computing.Description: Enables massive research sectors called Discovery Spheres.
Computing.Details: The Discovery Sphere is much the same as the version that the fleshlings produce except that our version took somewhat less time to achieve.||The Discovery Sphere is the ultimate way to research new technologies.

Biology.Details: By stimulating volcanic activity on the ocean floor, we can bring forth small islands above the water. From this, we can build cities that use these small islands as their foundation.

Industry.Description: Alows construction of ships designed for interstellar travel.
Industry.Details: The ability to design containers that are required to travel immense distances and survive extended periods of time in the vacuum of space is no trivial task.||Prior to space travel, civilizations with a lively tradition of science fiction tended to downplay or completely ignore what precisely was involved in producing things that travel from star to star.||Space, as is well known, is big. It's mind boggling big. But it is not nearly as empty as people believe. As early space explorers learned, often the hard way, traveling even between planets is hazardous.||Many early engineers focused almost totally on the propulsion of a ship rather than the actual construction of a ship. To many engineers, space travel was essentially putting either robots or organic travelers into a metal box and attaching propulsion. Not so at all.||First, these metal tubes in the vacuum of space are subjected to radiations that could scarcely be imagined by terrestrial scientists. Secondly, once outside the gravity well of a planet system, the metal tubes were routinely subjected to micro meteorites. Flecks of asteroids or bits of metal flying through space at hundreds of meters per second. ||The intersection of a space ship and flecks of high speed metal resulted in the shredding of said space ship.||Interstellar construction is a technology that allows for the construction of better, more efficient, and more durable star ships.

Computing.Details: Smaller is better. Period. That's what's nice about being cybernetic.

Logistics.Description: Allows for the research of materials that enhance ship integrity.
Logistics.Details: The ability for a ship to survive in space is well understood. But has been more difficult to understand is how ensure survival when another party is actively attempting to destroy that ship. While many defenses are being contemplated, another area of research is how to make the ship, tougher.||All ships are assigned a hull potential value (HP) also known as hit points to the military. This determines how much damage a ship can take without being destroyed. The advanced materials tree will allow scientists to find new ways to increase the HP of ships.

Weapons.Description: The conquest of the galaxy is ready to begin...
Weapons.Details: In the beginning, there were the Iconians. The weak organics were easily swept aside and fled from their own birth world.||For a long while, we were trapped on our home world, sending out probes to distant parts of the galaxy. As cybernetic organisms, range and distance shouldn't matter. But time does. Our race can only be produced by the source -- the spark of life which exists only on our home world. This means that our race cannot do generational space travel because we cannot reproduce on space ships.||It is somewhat ironic that our race would in most respects be best suited for intergalactic conquest in the absence of faster than light travel. But in reality, we required the human invented hyperdrive for our plans more so than any other species.||Space Conquest allows us to evaluate a series of strategies that, combined with our faster than light travel, will enable us to conquer the galaxy and exterminate the biologicals that stand in our way.

The immensity of space is daunting. And like all things that daunt us, we strive to kill it and everything in it.||That should be the lesson to all fleshlings that would get in our way - we kill things that create non optimal results for us.||The galaxy will be ours. It's only a matter of time. Now we must look at the means in which that conquest will take.
Beam weapons work by focusing energies into a direct shot. They have the advantage of having no ordnance, not missing, and can burn through an unprotected hull.

There are some types of ship modifications that can indeed help a given ship immensely in battle but are so bulky in size that their benefit to a single ship is greatly diminished. However, there are also ship modifications that can be adapted to help friendly ships near by just as much as the ship that is carrying it. ||The kinds of modifications that affect all the ships in a fleet are called Fleet Battle Tactics. A series of ship components that benefit all ships in a given fleet.

Tulon Weapon Focus is named after the researcher who discovered it -- Dr. Viliak Tulon. Tulon Weapon Focus is an immensely complex artificial intelligence algorithm that allows the various weapons on a ship to work more in concert to do more damage.| |The downside of Tulon Weapon Focus is the Hyper Computer required to run it. It is immense in size. Thus, equipping a single ship with Tulon weapon focus will indeed increase the effectiveness of its weapons but is foolish because of all the space it uses.||The plus side is that Tulon Weapon Focus can be used to control the weapon systems of friendly ships in a fleet allowing them all to gain this benefit.

Defenses.Details: The argument over whether we needed Enhanced Tri-Strontium remains in place. The corporation that creates the Tri-Strontium material has been on the verge of bankruptcy for some time since only the military makes use of this material.||However, here it is. Our tax dollars at work.

Duralthene armor is our prototype attempt to create a type of armor making use of a new element called Adamantium. Adamantium doesn't exist naturally. Rather, it is a derivative of an extremely rare element found occasionally in asteroids that have been recently struck by large comets.||Adamantium is the result of taking that rare material and subjecting it to an intense energy field. The result is a material that actually isn't completely in-sync with normal space. Duralthene armor is essentially taking the old Tri-Strontium alloy and coating it with trace amounts of this Adamantium material.||When a mass driver comes into contact with the Adamantium, the material of the mass driver is dissipated into the sub-dimensions of the Adamantium. It's difficult to explain but most of the mass is instantly moved out of our normal space and into a slightly out of sync dimension. The remaining material of the mass driver weapon is then absorbed through the traditional Tri-Strontium alloy.

It is an irony of research that many of the engineered results of technology are impractical for use. This is the case for many ship defense technologies that have been considered. These technologies do indeed improve the ship's defense rating but at a cost that is so high that it is impractical to use.| |However, many of these defense technologies can be adapted to help not just the ship that is using them but other ships in a given fleet. This adaptation is the purpose of the Fleet Defense technology branch.

Defenses.Description: Allows the construction of militarized starbases
Defenses.Details: Starbases are so much more capable than simply producing economic or cultural benefit. The military has been demanding more emphasis on the military aspects of starbase construction.||To that end, we have produced a series of proposals that will allow us to construct starbases of immense destructive potential.

Biology.Description: Allows colonies to increase population and morale
Biology.Details: While biological creatures require organic "food", cybnertic species such as the Yor can process energy directly. This is done through Charging stalks which provide power for the sentient machines.

Industry.Description: Increase planetary production with improved collectives.
Industry.Details: It is difficult for an organic species to even imagine how efficiently a cybernetic race such as the Yor can work together. Manufacturing Collectives are the heart of what makes the Yor industrial machine run.||With a Manufacturing Collective, the Yor work together seamlessly to convert raw materials into the products that the Yor need to achieve their objectives. The Collectives exist to allow the Yor to work more efficiently with one another as well as hook even more Yor into the system.||The Collective Manufacturing series of technologies take the Yor down the path of building better and better collectives.

Industry.Description: Further increase the manufacturing capacity of collectives
Industry.Details: This is the continuation of the effort to increase our capability in manufacturing through collectives.
This is the continuation of the effort to increase our capability in manufacturing through collectives.
This is the completion of the effort to increase our capability in manufacturing through collectives.

Propulsion.Details: Stellar Streams are a means of travel that can only be attemped by non-biological entities. ||At the edges of folded space are the stellar streams. To go within them results in radiation levels far beyond what could be tolerated by any organic species. For us, however, we can easily traverse the stellar streams which can significantly shorten the relative distance our ships have to travel resulting in faster travel time.

Biology.Description: Learn how to make use of biological life forms and environments
Biology.Details: Most of the galaxy is filled with carbon based life forms of various kinds. Because we were created by a biological life form, our own physical designs work best on the same kinds of planets as the organics which is an unfortunate situation we hope to rectify by studying more about other types of worlds and modifying the environments and ourselves to adapt.

Computing.Description: Enables transfer of technology to other worlds
Computing.Details: Our civilization has not had to adapt to other worlds. The Computational Matrix has been designed to enhance our ability to adapt to new patterns and environments which makes available a wide variety of technologies.

Industry.Details: Efficiency Studies is a series of technologies that allows us to streamline our entire economy. The result is a higher level of economic output.

Industry.Description: A new planetary improvement to increase manufacturing
Industry.Details: The Manufacturing Vortex is a massive construct that aids in the conversion of raw materials into energy and material. The net result is that a planet with a Manufacturing Vortex will see a significant boost in production.

Industry.Description: A massive building that can greatly increase our manufacturing capacity
Industry.Details: The Distributed Energy Matrix is the most expensive construction in the universe. However, it provides immense amounts of production for a given planet for those who dare to build it.

Biology.Details: We don't breed. ||As a cybernetic species, we do not experience birth or childhood. We are manufactured and when the time is right, the holy spark gives us consciousness. ||Needless to say, there are very real limitations on how fast we can manufacture more of our kind. This is particularly problematic as the holy spark only exists in one place that no one may speak of. The result has been that our population growth has been very slow relative to other civilizations.||Advanced Population Accleration evens the odds. Using secret techniques we are able to distribute the holy spark across our worlds to bring to sentience our kind faster.

We have now more than made up for our native disadvantage at population growth when compared to the fleshlings.||We have mastered how to bring the Spark of life to our people wherever they are and increase our population growth substantially.

Biology.Description: Increase population growth by lowering natural death rate
Biology.Details: The spark of life fades from us over time. We do not understand the mechanism of it. Our species is cybernetic. That is, we are ultimately machines.||As machines, we have, in theory, an unlimited lifespan. But, for some reason, we die. We have only the slightest understanding of what causes this but ultimately, the spark of life begins to fade and eventually, even the most potent of our race loses its sentience and returns to being an animated machine much as we were when we were created by the Iconians.||However, through time we have learned how to slow down the fading of the spark of life. It is only a little bit but it allows us to significantly increase our net population growth on planets.

Weapons.Details: Terror Drones work along side our soldiers and are extremely lethal. They make use of our native knowledge of building machines.||Terror Drones aren't sentient machines but are, nevertheless extremely effective in adapting to every kind of combat scenario.

Weapons.Description: Improve the quality of our soldiers
Weapons.Details: This is a continuation of the improvement in the Terror Drone technology which aid our soldiers during ground combat.

This is the ultimate manifestation of the Terror Drone technology. Terror Drones are nearly sentient machines that patrol beside our soldiers to greatly magnify the combat strength of our troops on planets.

The Scatter Blaster is the shotgun of space. It isn't particularly effective but what it lacks in quality it more than makes up for in quantity.||Scatter blasters are inexpensive to produce but use more space than other mass driver weapons of the same class.

The Scatter Blaster Mark II is essentially the same as the original but uses slightly less space.||It retains its advantage of being far cheaper than other types of mass driver weapons in the same class but also remains somewhat larger corresponding implementations.

Weapons.Description: Ultimate form of Scatter Blaster technology a basic mass driver weapon.
Weapons.Details: As space shotguns go, the Scatter Blaster III is about as good as they come. They are remarkably cheap to make and we've gotten it down to a reasonable amount of size (though still larger than similar weapons by other species).||We've taken this technology about as far as we can go.

Weapons.Description: A basic form of beam weapon
Weapons.Details: Kinetic streams are similar to lasers in that they both use highly focused light energy. The difference is that kinetic streams attempt to focus significantly more photons into the beam. ||As a result, Kinetic streams do the same level of damage but require a smaller amount of space to generate the energy to do the damage. The only downside is that they are significantly more expensive.
This is the further evolution of kinetic stream beam weapon technology.

Weapons.Description: Final stage of Kinetic Stream Technology
Weapons.Details: Kinetic Streams are expensive but they use less space than similar beam weapon technologies which, in battle, can prove crucial.

While other civilizations focus on big powerful missiles, we have invented the Seeker space missile.||Seeker missiles do not do nearly as much damage as other missiles of the same technological class. However, they cost a lot less and use a lot less space.

The Seeker II technology has a warhead damage rating of only 1 which is less than the damage of similar missile technologies. However, it has the advantage of costing significantly less than other missile technologies.

Weapons.Description: The ultimate in seeker missile technology
Weapons.Details: Seeker III technology continues the course having low yield warheads on inexpensive missiles. Quantity has a quality of its own.

Biology.Details: Advanced Charging stalks are significantly superior to the previous attemps at providing power to run our civilization. Planets with dedicated charging stalk sectors can significantly increase their population.

Industry.Details: Efficiency Studies is a series of technologies that allows us to streamline our entire economy. The result is a higher level of economic output.

Efficiency Studies III completes our practical research into finding new ways to streamline our economic output. We can now build the Efficiency Center on our planets. From here on out, we can improve efficiency in the theoretical sense which will still result in economic improvements for our civilization.
Continues to improve our economic capacity.
Continuing to enhance our economic output.

Industry.Description: A history of a cybernetic species
Industry.Details: The Yor are the first and only race of sentient machines. All other civilizations that have been found that are synthetic and sentient are in one way or the other an off-shoot of the Yor.||How the Yor achieved sentience is not well known. However, it is believed that the Precursor civilization known today as the "Dread Lords" gave the cybernetic creations of the Iconian race the spark of sentience. That sentience put the Yor on the evolutionary path that has brought them to where they are today.

Computing.Description: Seek new ways to invent new technologies
Computing.Details: One advantage that the biological organisms of the galaxy have over cybernetic is imagination. For whatever reason, organic based life that achieves sentience is able to make that "leap" that the machines cannot.||Synthetic Ingenuity is the answer to this deficiency. It works by introducing a random element into the calculations of pure research based computational systems. As a result, it simulates truly insightful thinking.
Similar to Synthetic Ingenuity, Creative Insight enables our research computers to "imagine" new types of technology that were simply impossible before.

Biology.Description: Protection against virus infection that would otherwise effectively kill our citizens.
Biology.Details: With antivirus software in place, we've come along way in protecting against the threat of viruses that could lead to our demise.

Biology.Description: Protect our existence by inspecting network traffic.
Biology.Details: The early application of certain devices makes all the difference in preventing future threats.
